GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
ASoC: mt6797-mt6351: Fix refcount leak in mt6797_mt6351_dev_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit b488ceb2336905f071f80627bc8a7d657274e5de, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit f0ab0bf250da5a115d5675a686117f21984f0760. For more details please see the references link.
